case.state: What in the world is this place?! It looks shady...
Hello? Is this the place my friend, Nozomi, told me about?
What are we supposed to do here?
The beach? I'd have bought some sun lotion, if Nozomi had bothered to tell me...
Next time, we could go to my parents' summer house. It has a private beach!
What are we supposed to do here? There are a lot of people watching, you know.
This roof reminds me of the time I spent rehearsing with the rest of µ's. How nostalgic!
What in the world is this place?! It looks shady...
Hello? Is this the place Nozomi told me about?
What are we supposed to do here?
T-Today is my birthday, by the way.
Since it's April 19th, it means that is my birthday. I don't know if you care though.
I don't know why Nozomi wanted me to come here on my birthday, though.
Today is Hanayo's birthday. She is one of my best friends.
I should end this quickly, today is Hanayo's birthday after all.
I ordered a rice cake for Hanayo. Today is her birthday after all.
Do you know what day is today? Today is Umi's birthday.
Today is Umi's birthday. I hope she likes my present.
Umi is a bit strict, but she is a really caring girl. Today is her birthday, so we'll go celebrate later.
Today is Nozomi's birthday, so I expected her to be here. Guess I was wrong.
Wait, Nozomi isn't here? She says that I should go to this place, yet she isn't here so I can give her her birthday present.
Happy birthday, Nozomi! Wait, she isn't here?
Since today is a special day... Nico Nico Nii~. Happy birthday, Nico-chan!
Nico Nico... forget this. Happy birthday, Nico-chan.
The #1 idol in the universe must be busy, but today is her birthday. Happy birthday, Nico-chan!
If Honoka didn't want me to join μ's, I don't know how I'd have spent my high school years. Happy birthday, Honoka!
Today is the birhday of μ's leader, Honoka. Happy birthday!
Later we have a party at Honoka's house to celebrate her birthday.
Today is our tailor's birthday. Happy birthday Kotori!
Happy birthday, Kotori. I'm sure you'll make a lot of beautiful dresses in the future.
I bought a very nice dress for Kotori's birthday. Don't tell her, OK?
С днем варенья, Eli! I tried to do it in russian, but I'll say it again now. Happy birthday, Eli!
Happy birthday, Eli! I hope to also celebrate your birthday in the years to come!
Today is Eli's birthday! At first she was opposed to μ's, but in the end she joined, and we improved a lot ever since!
Happy birthday, Rin! Even if sometimes you infuriate me, I care about you.
Since it's Rin's birthday, I guess we'll go dinner to a ramen restaurant to celebrate.
Rin likes cats a lot, so for her birthday, I bought a giant kitty plush just for her.
Didn't expect to be here on Halloween. I should have brought some treats.
Today it's Halloween! My friends and I carved faces in pumpkins, and it was really funny indeed. I took some pics if you want to check them later.
Did you know that the Jack-o'-lantern tradition started in Ireland? One day I'd like to visit it, I'm sure it's a wonderful country!
A New Year already? Time sure flies.
This could be an interesting way to start up the year!
I didn't expect to meet new people on New Year's Day!
IT'S FINALLY CHRISTMAS!!! Santa-san came by again this year because I've been a good girl!
It's Christmas Day! What did Santa-san bring you all?
Christmas Time! We should celebrate it! I got a lot of presents from Santa-san!
W-What the hell? W-Why are you naked, ~player~?
~player~? W-Why are you naked?
C-Cover yourself up, ~player~!
We're all girls, except for this guy. You're called ~player~, right? I'll keep an eye on you.
A guy here? That's awfully suspicious.
One guy and four girls... it's weird since I don't see men very often. I don't know why.
D-Did that butterfly just talk?
Am I going crazy? I swear I just heard that butterfly talk.
Today is Valentine's Day... not that I care.
Seems like I'm not the only one spending Valentine's here...
So many girls here, it's just like Otonokizaka.
Since it's only girls here, this should be OK.
Do you want to become school idols? I'm joking, but I like that we're all girls.
W-Why am I surrounded by men?
Am I the only girl here? I have a bad feeling about this.
Great, I'm the only girl. *sigh*
My name is Maki Nishikino. Nice to meet you.
This shouldn't be hard.
I'll get a perfect mark, like in the tests!
Nozomi told me that I could learn how to be myself here, but I don't get what she meant...
I don't get this.
Are we going to play a card game? Didn't expect anything else from Nozomi...
Even in poker, I won't lose! I beat Umi easily! ...Although, everybody can beat her, now that I think about it...
Your name is Ladybug, right? Your outfit's similar to... never mind.
W-Why did your outfit have to match my underwear? Now you've made it weird...
It's not like I watch your videos or anything, but is it true that you're a fan of Nico-chan, ~kizuna~?
Give me ~cards~ cards, please.
I'll need ~cards~.
Can I have ~cards~, please?
G-Give me ~cards~ cards, please.
Another ~cards~, please.
Can I have ~cards~?
I don't need cards, thanks.
I won't exchange cards this time.
I'll keep these cards, thanks.
Give me ~cards~ card, please.
I'll need ~cards~.
Can I have ~cards~, please?
G-Give me ~cards~ card, please.
Another ~cards~, please.
Can I have ~cards~?
I'll exchange ~cards~ cards.
Maki-chan pretty?
Maki-chan kawaii?
Nico Nico Nii, anata no hato ni Nico Nico Nii! Egao todokeru Yazawa Nico Nico! Nico Nii de oboete rabu Nico!
These cards are as good as myself.
Cool, calm and collected, right? That's probably me.
You're not going to beat me.
Aishiteru Banzai koko de... ♪ sorry, I let myself go a little bit.
As expected for someone like me.
I have this one in the bag.
Do you think you can beat me? Hehe, think again.
I should be safe for this one.
This is a good one. What about yours, ~player~?
There's no reason to be afraid this time.
Hey, ~player~, can you tell me a bit about yourself? You don't talk much...
Do you think this hand is good, ~player~? You'll have to wait for the reveal~
Is it a good thing if you have four of the same number? ...Just kidding. I know how to play, ~player~!
There are things you can't buy with money. Like being this lucky!
Of course I was going to win this one.
Do you want to swap cards with me, ~player~? Not this time, hehe.
Average for me.
Not bad at all. You could say that this hand fits me.
You see, experience is a big factor in these kind of games. If you lack it, you'd need to rely on something subjective, like luck.
Looks like we have a winner in me.
Nico Nico Nii... This is ridiculous, I don't get why you like Nico-chan at all, Ai.
At least I'm not going to lose this one.
Do you think you can win this one? Hehe.
These should do it, but I'm not even sure anymore.
I don't have to worry for now.
For once, these look good. I don't get why I've been losing so much...
~player~, do you know who's going to lose this one? Not me!
This feels much better than exposing myself.
See? Being intelligent helps you get a good hand like this one.
If all my hands were like this, I wouldn't be in this situation...
Why are you looking at me? I'm going to win this time.
The more I think about how many hands I lost, the angrier I get. Why couldn't they have been as good as this one?
Even if I teach you, you wouldn't be able to beat this hand, ~player~.
Since I'm not losing this one, could it be that you're gonna lose, ~player~?
Maybe you got lucky this time, ~player~, but I bet my hand's even luckier!
This could be the first step to winning my dignity back!
I needed these ones a few rounds ago!
At least I'm safe for now.
I'm winning this one, I hope.
This is a nice change!
Just what I needed!
I can actually win this thing!
I can sigh in relief this time.
You won't beat me this time!
I'm in control for now!
Everything is going to be good from now on!
I wish I could win back clothes with hands like this one.
If only I had a hand like this before, I wouldn't be in this situation.
Since I'm going to win this one, let's get to know each other a bit more. What's your favorite food?
This hand is as good as tomatoes!
This is really good! Do you know what else are good? Tomatoes!
Since this one is good, I'll remind you of something else... Tomatoes! They're really good, ~player~.
It could be worse.
What did you get, ~player~?
I should be fine.
I'm not sure what to expect from this hand...
This could go either way.
Not too bad, but not too good either.
There are some times when you can't predict how it'll end...
I guess not all hands can be good ones...
This hand doesn't really stand out...
What's the point of not getting good cards? I don't get it.
I can't swap my cards again? C'mon, dealer...
You might have a chance of beating me this time.
I don't like how this could end...
Maybe I shouldn't have exchanged that card.
This hand isn't that bad, but I can't be happy about it.
How should I feel about this?
What should I do?
I don't understand this at all!
Could you throw this one for me please, ~player~?
This hand is like an orange... it just leaves a bad taste in my mouth.
Ugh, not the best way to keep my dignity.
I was expecting something better, honestly.
O-OK, can I take a break from the game? ...I can't?
I can't concentrate with a hand like this.
In normal poker, you can leave whenever you want! So why I can't do it here, then?
D-Don't look at me like that, ~player~, it won't change my hand.
I should try to stay calm, even with this hand.
Not the best, but it might be enough.
I should try to win again. Even if this won't suffice.
...Where are you staring?
Too close to the edge...
I-I can't lose my cool.
C-C'mon Maki, you can still do it, probably.
I don't want to lose again!
D-Don't smirk, ~player~, i-it's weird, OK?
~Player~, I've been told that I'm beautiful, but drooling is a bit too much.
Why I can't get better cards, even once?
This is not exactly what I expected, but it could have been worse.
Not the best hand, but hopefully not the worst, either.
If I imagine that I'm with the rest of µ's, maybe this hand will get better...
Not very comfortable, neither my situation, nor this hand.
Seriously, Nozomi... how did you get me involved in this?
I suppose it's not so bad to lose... But I do find it odd that we didn't bet chips.
Sometimes you win, sometimes you lose. But since there's no money involved, I can't really complain.
It would have been worse to lose if I bet something, but since I didn't, it's OK.
What is this?!
W-What?!
This doesn't look good at all.
I'm losing this time.
I-I'm OK. Not worried at all.
Dealer, what do you mean, we can't reset the round?
I hate to lose, especially in this kind of game.
Losing a hand in a strip poker game will be one of my worse defeats...
Dealer! Hey, dealer, don't ignore me when I'm telling you to give me actual cards! ...What do you mean, "Those are the cards"
I don't get why Nozomi wanted me to get naked in front of strangers...
So this is how it feels when your pride is shattered....
I haven't felt this bad since Honoka, Kotori and Umi graduated....
Why do I have to do this?
N-No! Not like this!
These are my cards?! Dealer!
Wait, this means... oh no.
Will I have to actually...?
If you dare laugh, I'm going to tell Papa!
I wish I were in the music room...
These cards are worse than the time I scored 68 in a test!
Great, just great.
No. Just no. These cards. No.
These cards are underwhelming.
What am I supposed to do with a hand this bad?
I should have studied more.
W-What did I do to deserve this?
Oh no, oh no, oh no, oh no, oh no, oh no!
I may lose this hand, but I'm not beaten yet.
I can still win this thing! ...Just not this time.
C-Can you spare me?
Oh no! This is too embarrassing!
No, please no...
Are you sure you're not cheating?
Oh c'mon, not again!
But I'm almost done for!
C-Can I really not leave?
These cards came at the worst possible moment!
All that time studying didn't pay off...
Are you feeling it? It's the taste of defeat. You can't beat me.
When you're way ahead, this game is really funny. You're all dreaming if you think you can win this thing.
Well, now that I'm quite comfortably ahead, are you already regretting face against me?
After the initial shock, I'm starting to understand the situation. I'd like to have a few words with Nozomi after the game, though.
OK, I think I'm starting to get it. But there are more enjoyable games than strip poker out there. Next time, let's try some Monopoly.
Jeez... Why did Nozomi send me to a strip poker game? Whatever, I'll talk to her later.
Actually, this is kinda funny, especially when I'm winning.
Since I'm winning, I guess I can enjoy this a little.
Jeez... I guess it's not so bad to enjoy winning.
I don't understand how I ended up in this situation after being well ahead. Guess I was too overconfident.
I need to step up my game, losing now would be embarrassing.
I may be in my underwear, but before, you weren't boasting so much. Let's see who has the last laugh!
What happened? I've really let this get out of hand... I need to focus!
This isn't going as planned, but I guess playing with you all wasn't that bad, in the end.
OK, OK, this has been fun, I'll admit it, but I shouldn't be this close to defeat!
I-I'm OK! I'll definitely turn the tables this time!
I-I can still win this thing, for sure!
This got a little out of control, b-but I won't give up!
That's enough! You may have pushed me to my limit, but I'll win this! ...W-What's so funny?
Do you think this is funny? I'll give you something to laugh about!
I haven't been beaten yet! I'll show you what I can do when I'm serious!
Now that I've been playing for a while, I can see the appeal of it, but I can't relax.
I kinda get the enjoyment of playing now, but I still think that Monopoly was a better alternative.
This game is a bit funny, but it's still too risky.
I feel my heart pounding. I don't want to lose but...
Is there a reset button for the whole game? I don't like where this is heading to.
Won't you spare me? I mean, I'm losing, that's enough of a prize for you, right? Who am I kidding, you probably want to see me naked.
Nico-chan? Is that you?
I usually like to listen to jazz and classical music, but when I started composing songs for µ's, I started to appreciate other genres.
Normally I listen to... wait, what did you call me?
Wait, aren't you supposed to be out when you're already naked? Weird.
It's nice that you let naked people compete to get their clothes back.
You can still play when you're naked? I thought you'd be out.
I can continue playing? That's actually nice of you... You might not be that bad after all.
I didn't expect that you'd allow me to continue, but if I can win my clothes back, it would be fine.
I don't get why I get cards if I'm naked, but I suppose it's fine.
B-Because they remind you of amethysts? S-Stop, you idiot!
B-Because you "can't look away from those gemstones"? Y-You're making me blush, idiot!
B-Because "eyes are the mirror of the soul, and yours are beautiful"? Kyaaa! I-Idiot!
Be careful Sakura! You could kill someone with that bra... or those breasts... you know what? Forget I said anything.
Once, during rehearsal, Eli's bra broke mid-dance. I'll never forget those breasts bouncing around, or how jealous the look on Nico-chan's face was.
Those could give Nozomi a run for her money, Sakura.
You must have mistaken me for someone else, Mahiru.
Ultimate Assassin? That's offensive.
Are you talking to me, Mahiru? Because it isn't funny.
You're the only one left, Megumin. Give up, and I might have mercy on you.
Just the two of us left, Megumin. But I'll be the last one standing at the end.
It's almost a miracle that you're still in the game, Megumin, but I'll fix that soon enough.
I-I can play that game too, ~player~, just wait and see!
I-If you're going to make me blush, I'll make you blush too, ~player~!
I may lose at strip poker, but I won't lose when it comes to making you blush, ~player~!
I-I know that I suck at this, I wasn't the lyricist of µ's. D-Do you like it, ~player~? Y-You don't need to compliment me for that... dummy.
T-That came out wrong, ~player~. W-Wait, did you like it? Y-You're w-weird... b-but thank you.
D-Don't laugh, ~player~, I was horrible. W-Wait, you liked it? Y-You're so simple... but thanks.
Don't forget to wash your hands! That way, you won't spread the virus, and you'll be safe.
"Your stunning amber eyes are like a beautiful dawn". ...How was that?
"Your amber eyes look like they were made of gold". ...How was that?
"Your amber eyes look like flames that'll never die". ...How was that?
"Your beautiful blue eyes look like the sea". ...How was that?
"Your blue eyes look like they were made out of lapis lazuli". ...How was that?
"Your blue eyes look like a clear sky". ...How was that?
"Your beautiful dark eyes look like the void of space". ...How was that?
"Your dark eyes look like they were made out of jasper". ...How was that?
"Your dark eyes look like a starry night". ...How was that?
"Your beautiful green eyes look like fresh grass". ...How was that?
"Your green eyes look like they were made out of emeralds". ...How was that?
"Your green eyes look like a spring field". ...How was that?
"Your beautiful pale eyes look like the snow". ...How was that?
"Your pale eyes look like they were made from diamond". ...How was that?
"Your pale eyes look like a shooting star". ...How was that?
"Your beautiful violet eyes look like lavender". ...How was that?
"Your violet eyes look like they were made out of amethysts". ...How was that?
"Your violet eyes look like cherry blossoms". ...How was that?
"Your beautiful red eyes look like tomatoes". ...How was that?
"Your red eyes look like they were made from rubies". ...How was that?
"Your red eyes look like a summer sunset". ...How was that?
"Your beautiful eyes look like shining moonlight". ...How was that?
"Your eyes look like they were made from love". ...How was that?
"Your eyes look like something beautiful". ...How was that?
Now that you mention it, Eli and Nozomi were always out eating parfait. I don't get why it always took them so long.
Do you even know who you're talking to? I'll accept your little challenge, but don't come crying to me afterwards when you regret it, Megumin.
Megumin, Megumin, Megumin... Did you think I'd fall for a childish trick like that? But, since you're so hopeless, I guess I'll play along, just to teach you a lesson.
You, beating me? That's not gonna happen, Megumin. I'll show you why I'm the cleverest student in Otonokizaka.
You're so proud of yourself, just like Nico-chan... You know what, Megumin? I'm going to enjoy having you as my minion. Waki-san would love to have a helper, after all.
A Tamagotchi? Really? Are we in the 90's again?
That thing was already outdated when Mama was my age. You should get with the times, Saki.
Do they still sell those things, Saki? I haven't seen one in like... Actually, I've never seen one, now that I think about it.
I-I swear that I don't care about Valentine's.
I-I'm perfectly fine about Valentine's Day.
I-I don't feel alone at all, despite being Valentine's.
Only Rin and Hanayo gave me chocolate today, but it was more like a friendship one...
I don't have anyone to give chocolates either, so...
All the Valentine's stuff makes me a bit jealous... but just a bit.
S-So, do you have someone to spend Valentine's, ~player~?
So, how did you end here in Valentine's, ~player~? I'm sure someone like you would have a lot of suitors.
D-Do you have plans for Valentine's, ~player~?
To meet you on a Valentine's Day... is that what they call destiny, ~player~?
Y-You kinda saved this year's Valentine's for me, ~player~. Thank you.
It can't be helped, I'll be with you this Valentine's, ~player~.
I-I appear to have some Valentine's chocolates... d-do you want them, ~player~?
Would you like some chocolates, ~player~? It's traditional in Japan to give them to someone special on Valentine's.
I'll give you some chocolates, ~player~. Don't worry, it's for free. If you want to give me something, you can do it on White Day. It's logical, right?
Oh, by the way, White Day is on March 14th. It's celebrated in Japan, and it's about returning the favor to the one who gave you something on Valentine's.
So it's just you and me left, ~player~. I don't like to lose, but if I have to, I prefer to do it against you.
We're the only ones left, ~player~. At least if I lose, you'll be the winner instead of someone else.
Both of us as the only players left, ~player~. It's kinda romantic, don't you agree?
That's... concerning, Megumin, even if you're talking about a video game.
That's not something you should be proud of, Megumin.
Megumin, that's not funny! You shouldn't joke about that.
Usually it's more hygienic, especially when you're practicing sports. I remember Nico-chan shaved hers... or maybe she was just naturally hairless.
It does have its appeal, for sure. You can ask anybody, and they'll most likely say that they prefer shaved. It's the norm, right?
Why don't you try it yourself, Megumin? I can help you if you want.
Maybe the music can't help in a fight, but it did help to prevent Otonokizaka from shutting down. See? It's useful, unlike you.
Are you trying to pick a fight, Megumin? You're only talking so big because you've never pissed off a school idol before.
Wow, what did you just say about music, Megumin? I can't hear you from all the way down there, dwarf.
At least I'm talented at something, Megumin. Do you have any talents besides being annoying?
I used to perform as a school idol, singing and dancing live. But that was a couple of years ago. Right now, I'm just studying for med school.
Right now? Just the usual student stuff. Studying for tests, checking documents in the student council... I also play piano, but nowadays, that's just for fun.
I used to compose and play the instrumental parts of our songs, but since µ's disbanded, I only study. Even if I write some music sheets, I can't do a song without everyone.
You think so? If I want to become a doctor, I need to be able to stomach some disgusting things. Who knows, maybe you'll be the one calling me for help.
Me being squeamish? If you can beat those monsters it's because you scare them, not because you're strong.
Really? I might need your help then. I'm having trouble with a small girl in witch cosplay called Megumin. I think she's suffering from a severe case of delirium.
If you're going to stare at my feet, why don't you kneel down and kiss them? You're annoying.
Kazuma, if you continue looking at my feet, I'm going to step on your face.
Do you want me to step on you or something, Kazuma? You're disgusting.
I feel like Nozomi just wanted to find me a date for Valentine's.
Honestly, what is even the point of Valentine's? If you love somebody, you should love it all the days of the year.
I don't care about Valentine's at all. It's not like I have someone in mind for it.
How long has this game been? If I'd known it'd take this long, I would have brought a chair.
This is taking longer than expected. My legs kind of hurt.
How much longer is this going to take? I want to leave, you know.
Look at your own cards!
I don't get it.
If only I had Nozomi's luck...
Hey, ~player~, what do you think about my hand...?
I have a really good hand. ...Or I might not. Can you really tell, ~player~?
See? I can actually put on a poker face, unlike Umi.
Let's end this quickly.
What is this...? I don't get it!
Oh! These cards are really curious!
Are you wondering about my cards, ~player~? You'll see them soon enough.
Why do I feel like I've heard your voice elsewhere, Saki...?
Have you ever gotten a really strong feeling of deja vu? I'm getting that right now with Saki's voice...
Saki, were you in another group before your current one? I think I've heard your voice somewhere, but I can't put my finger on it...
D-Don't stare at me like that! You're creeping me out!
Honestly, Umi is the worst poker player I've ever seen. You can tell how good her hand is just by looking at her face!
A-Aren't you going to acknowledge that ~player~ is naked?
Why aren't you surprised that ~player~ is naked?
Since ~player~ is naked, I have a bad feeling about this.
W-What? I have to strip? Can't I pay money, instead?
Wait, strip poker?! Why did Nozomi send me here!?
What the hell do you mean, "we're betting clothes"?! Are you kidding me?!
Why are you all looking at me? ...Strip poker?! What the hell?!
W-Why do I have to be the first one to show?!
B-But no one else did it yet!
I need to go first?!
Thank you, Megumin. Maybe we can compare our uniforms sometime.
Thanks, Megumin. Is your uniform more of a naval style, or is it something like mine?
Do you think my school uniform is adorable, Megumin? I appreciate it. Next time you should bring yours.
Of course it isn't your style, Megumin. You can't have a style if you're naked.
Do you like my uniform, Megumin? Thank you, I appreciate your... effort.
Thank you, Megumin. Knowing how to play actually helps you keep your clothes on. Crazy, right?
Well, I've played normal poker before, just not this version.
I used to play with the other members of µ's. I mean, normal poker, not strip poker. Usually, Nozomi won easily.
Not this version, no. When I played, it was for fun, not for humiliation.
Not this perverted version, but yes, I've played it before, Megumin. You can tell by how badly I beat you.
Exactly. And congratulations, Megumin; I never expected to find a worse poker player than Umi, and yet here we are.
I'm not a professional poker player, but compared to you, Megumin?
I don't play roleplaying games. I have better things to do, Megumin.
Arch Wizard? Is that what you call witches and stuff? I don't believe in those silly things.
I didn't realize that you were an 'architect' or whatever, Megumin. I don't really care for fantasy things myself.
An Arch Wizard? More like a Nude Wizard, don't you think?
If you're a wizard, why didn't you use your powers for... I don't know, not losing?
I can't really tell if you're a wizard or a witch when you're naked, Megumin.
Tsk. You might be right for once, Megumin. I can't lose any more hands.
You don't need to point it out, Megumin, I'm already well-aware of my situation...
I need to get serious. You're distracting me with all your antics, Megumin.
At least I can still take some losses, unlike you, Megumin.
That's ironic, coming from a loser like you, Megumin.
Seeing you like that's reassuring, Megumin. It lets me know how much better I am than you.
I don't really have anything small left. So next is...
D-Did you notice, Megumin? T-There must be something else I can do!
You're right, Megumin. W-Wait, you're right?!
Thank you, Megumin, but at this point I don't really mind if you want to look.
I didn't say that you can't look, Megumin. I mean, we're both girls, after all.
You can look if you want, just make sure to lose the next hand if you want to make me happy.
What? But you're naked Megumin, it doesn't feel fair.
It's not like I want you to watch me, Megumin, but since I already saw you naked, it wouldn't feel right if you didn't look.
I know that you want to look, Megumin, so just do it. I would prefer you to be honest rather than a liar... even if that makes you a perv.
T-They're just average, Megumin!
W-Why are you talking about my breasts? W-Warn me first if you're gonna talk about them, Megumin!
A proud pair? What are you...? Oh no! I-I didn't realize that I have to-!
And why do you say that, Megumin? Your breasts are cute, and you should be proud of them!
Thank you Megumin, but you shouldn't be ashamed of your breasts.
Don't be so harsh about them, Megumin. I mean, I don't dislike your breasts.
I-I know that those are the rules, but that's too much, Megumin!
